footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Freminet | Update Date: 11/29/2023 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Beacon of the Reed Sea__
BiS 5 star weapon, excellent stat stick.
__Serpent Spine__
4 star BP weapon
__Tidal Shadow__
4 star craftable weapon, gives a lot of ATK%, needing good Energy Recharge and CRIT stats.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Song of Broken Pines, Redhorn Stonethresher, The Unforged, Skyward Spine__
Similar to Beacon of the Reed Sea, but providing different sets of stats and passives.
__Snow-Tombed Starsilver, Prototype Archaic__
Slightly less reliable statsticks, both craftable.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Cryo DMG Bonus% or Physical DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge|CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|ATK%|Physical or Cryo DMG Bonus Goblets depend on your playstyle. ATK% goblets may be viable, especially with Furina.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Pressurized Floe
**2)** Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies
**2)** Elemental Burst: Shadowhunter's Ambush
(*Prioritize Normal Attack for Physical, Elemental Burst for Cryo after leveling your Elemental Skill*)

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
You may want to mix 2-piece sets of ATK%, Golden Troupe, Cryo/Physical DMG Bonus% etc. 
__Golden Troupe__ is general, __Blizzard Strayer__ is similar in Cryo and __Pale Flame__ is the best for Physical Builds.
